summary: Highlight text at a fixed location
name: synmark.vim
description: This plugin provides commands for highlighting text at a fixed position. This works by dropping "marks" for the start and end of a region to be highlighted. It is mainly of use for other plugins, which display some externally provided text, and need to highlight some externally prescribed portions of it.
install_details: Standard. The archive includes the plugin, synmark.vim, to be placed in some 'plugin' directory, and a help file, synmark.txt, which goes into a parallel 'doc' directory. Then, :helptags should be run for that directory.

versions.release_notes: 1. Prevent errors when marking a region end without marking its start2. Changed the package directory structure for easier installation
